alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas; Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 30 at 3:29AM CDT until April 30 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with localized amounts of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Douglas, Bayfield and Price Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Red Cliff Band. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is not expected to impact the city of Superior in Douglas County.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
